messages.message: Invalid pixelHeight. pixelHeight must not be 0 if pixelDepth is not also 0.
messages.details: pixelHeight is 0 and pixelDepth is 4 but pixelHeight must not be 0 if pixelDepth is not 0 as well.

messages.message: Invalid byteLength in Level Index. byteLength must match the expected value.
messages.details: Level 0 byteLength is 512 but based on the vkFormat, DFD and image sizes the expected value is 128.

messages.message: Invalid uncompressedByteLength in Level Index. For non-supercompressed files the uncompressedByteLength must match the expected value of byteLength.
messages.details: Level 0 uncompressedByteLength is 512 but based on the vkFormat, DFD and image sizes the expected value is 128.
